title: Replace BidArena logo with user-provided logo asset

requirements.text: Replace the currently used BidArena logo image with the user-provided logo asset, ensuring the updated logo appears everywhere the logo is rendered (at minimum: the header logo and the footer logo).

quotes: Yes...change the logo to wat I gave

acceptanceCriteria: The header logo image is updated to the user-provided logo and renders without broken image links.
The footer logo image is updated to the user-provided logo and renders without broken image links.
No remaining tags in the app reference the old logo path "/assets/generated/bidarena-logo.dim_512x512.png" unless the user-provided logo is intentionally placed at that same path/filename.

constraints: Do not serve images via the backend; keep the logo as a frontend static asset (e.g., under frontend/public).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the landing page layout, colors, typography, or copy.
Do not add new sections or bidding functionality.
